events.title: Vinyl Night
events.description: Join us every Monday for an intentional listening experience. Share your favorite tunes and discover new music while enjoying house-made beer and snacks. Bring in a record from your collection and in exchange, we will play it for the pub and give you a free beer to sip on while you sit back and listen.

events.title: Mountain ReVerb
events.description: Tony will be SHREDDING some Tedeschi Trucks, Jimmy Hendrix, Pink Floyd, Prince and Big Head Todd solos among others. For those of you who know Tony - you know!!

events.title: Tenbucksixer
events.description: Tenbucksixer is an original band with folk-rock songs that can take you by surprise, with lyrics and tunes that are sometimes whimsical, sometimes serious, but always witty, poetic, and insightful.  they will tickle you with fun, prod you with clever, and touch you with soulful tunes.

events.title: MMB3 Organ Trio
events.description: MMB3 Organ Trio feature Ryan McCurry on Hammond Organ and vocals, John Massone on guitar and vocals, and Steve Balgooyen on drums and vocals. MMB3 plays a mix of classic funk, soul and blues—originals and creative takes on classic covers—with a New Orleans sensibility.

events.title: Open Mic Night
events.description: Music open mic, sign up at 5:30, about 15 minute time slots, often runs till 8:30 or a little later but general timeline is 6-8. Come down and eat dinner and have drinks and enjoy the music community here!

events.title: Karaoke Night
events.description: Take the Bricks Main Stage ... you're the headliner!

events.title: Main St Laughs - FREE Stand Up Comedy Ft. Mentalist/Magician
events.description: Free comedy. Great drinks. Big laughs. Don’t miss this killer lineup of Colorado’s best stand-up comics at Bricks on Main!

events.title: Wylie Jones
events.description: Wylie Jones is a multi instrumentalist one man band loop artist like the great Keller Williams, with the spirit of Toots, Bob Marley and Metallica wrapped into one.

events.title: Winter Walkabout Music Showcase
events.description: An all-day, multi-venue music festival featuring local music, unique venues, good vibes & community spirit, and the best that Downtown Longmont has to offer!

events.title: Defunkt Railroad
events.description: Defunkt Railroad plays a mix of New Orleans Funk, Zydeco, Blues, Rock, and R&B.

events.title: The Big Spenders
events.description: The Big Spenders are an Alt-Country band from Denver, CO. A blend of the best songs, fine players, and great vocals, this band rocks and twangs for a really great time.

events.title: The Pamlico Sound Valentine's Day Show
events.description: Looking for a fun thing to do on Valentine's Day? Come listen to some funk and soul!

events.title: Celebration of Life for Davy Allard
events.description: Davy made an indelible mark on the music community of Longmont and across the front range. Come celebrate his life with music, food and friends. He will be sorely missed! Hosted by his family and friends. Open to all.

events.title: The Saints
events.description: The Saints is a 6-piece band that has an authentic New Orleans feel. We play a mix of funk, R&B, soul, and rock, featuring both original tunes and cover songs. We have three vocalists who all sing lead (providing a lot of variety), and we have tight 3-part harmonies, which are a huge crowd-pleaser.

events.title: Steel Monkey
events.description: The Steel Monkey Band is a tribute band dedicated to celebrating the music of Ian Anderson and Jethro Tull, known for their distinctive blend of progressive rock, folk, and classical influences. The bands dedication to authenticity and musicianship positions them as a noteworthy act as a tribute.

events.title: DJ Drake
events.description: Longmont's very own DJ Drake will share the stage with longtime friend and renowned DJ Uplifter (now based in Kona), for the ultimate tribute to our top two legends, Michael Jackson and Prince. Get ready to dance to the all the hits and some supporting artists, like The Jacksons & Morris Day.

events.title: The Gentlethem’s Club: A Mystic Moonlit Cabaret
events.description: Welcome to The Gentlethem’s Club, a sensual evening  with the vintage charm of cabaret.

events.title: HOUSE of FIRE: COSMIC GLOW
events.description: GET READY TO BLAST OFF INTO ANOTHER GALAXY!

events.title: Open Mic with Steve Koppe at Roots Music Project
events.description: Roots Music Project Community Open Mic with host Steve Koppe

events.title: Sober Night Live! 105.5 The Colorado Sound Presents
events.description: Monthly open mic for sober creatives. Share your art, find your community, perform in a supportive space. Free admission, donations welcome.

events.title: Tim Cook &  Godson - An Intimate Soul & Roots Evening
events.description: Subdudes bassist Tim Cook + Godson Seth Strickland of Green Buddha perform intimate originals & classics.

events.title: Roots & Soul: An Evening with Hazel Miller & Jack Hadley
events.description: Colorado music legends, Hazel Miller and Jack Hadley join forces for a special evening of soul, heart, laughter and song.

events.title: Face Vocal Band: A Valentine's Night of Harmony & Heart
events.description: Celebrate love in all forms with Face Vocal Band's stunning harmonies, heartfelt ballads & infectious energy. Valentine's magic awaits!

events.title: Stephen Kellogg and The Homecoming w/special guest gutter sinatra (Night 1)
events.description: "Two incredible songwriters bring nostalgia & heart to the stage. An unforgettable evening of soulful music & storytelling awaits!"

events.title: Stephen Kellogg and The Homecoming w/special guest gutter sinatra (Night 2)
events.description: "Two incredible songwriters bring nostalgia & heart to the stage. An unforgettable evening of soulful music & storytelling awaits!"

events.title: “Come Away with Me” a Valentine’s Day tribute to Norah Jones
events.description: “Come Away with Me” a Valentine’s Day tribute to Norah Jones

events.title: TEMPO: Music Industry Program Info Session-  Free Open House
events.description: Come check out our  Music Industry Program info Session- Free Open House on February 18th, 2026!

events.title: RMP's Monthly Jazz, Soul, and Groove Jam Sessions
events.description: RMP Monthly Jam: Musicians unite for collaborative jazz, soul & groove performance. Pro artists create dynamic musical fusion. Free Event!

events.title: Cosmic Smoke Wagon + Howlin' Goatz +  Guest: Bovine Intervention
events.description: Heavy stoner rock meets high-energy Rock N' Roll! Three bands including a special guest bring the thunder for a night of sonic power.

events.title: TEMPO Program (February 23rd through April 26th, 2026)
events.description: TEMPO: Training Emerging Musicians for Professional Opportunities

events.title: Resonance & Ritual featuring Tim Snider & Kayla Diana
events.description: Step into an evening where sound becomes medicine and rhythm becomes ritual.

events.title: Dave Watts and Friends w/ Big Ol' Pig
events.description: Berklee grad & Motet founder Dave Watts leads an all-star jam-funk night with Lucas Parker, Ryan Benthall & Ola Timothy. Big Ol' Pig opens!

events.title: Asteroid Please! & Bear Hat: RMP Vinyl Release Party benefiting MS
events.description: Come join us for RMP's Vinyl Release Party supporting MS.  Colorado's hottest rising stars unite for a cause!

events.title: Back to the 2000s: Nostalgic Dance Party Fundraiser
events.description: Dance to 2000s hits while supporting young musicians through TEMPO. Every ticket helps the next generation of artists shine.

events.title: RMP Workshop: Logic Pro Workshop: Basic Recording Techniques
events.description: Learn recording & mixing basics in Logic Pro: setup, gain staging, EQ & compression. Beginner-friendly, skills transfer to other DAWs.

events.title: Roots Music Project Workshop: Classic Songwriting Transformation (4 Weeks)
events.description: Learn classic chord progressions & ostinatos to write original songs. 4-week course. Create 2 finished works. Break through creative blocks.

events.title: Global Bass Gathering w/ Mah Ze Tar, Peace Sine, Bloomurian and DROS
events.description: ✨ Step into a World Bass Ritual where ancient tones meet future frequencies.

events.title: College Showcase w Abernathy Shagnaster, Words of Mouth and Red Revival
events.description: College music is booming in Boulder! Three powerhouse bands from the CU scene bring Rock N' Soul, Roots Rock & country vibes. Let loose!

events.title: RMP Vinyl Release: GEN3, Fruta Brutal
events.description: Celebrate the Release of RMP On The Rise Vol. 1 with live performances from GEN3 and Fruta Brutal!

events.title: Roots Music Project Workshop: Creative Production Techniques
events.description: Learn experimental production techniques in Ableton. Create ambient soundscapes. Beginner-intermediate. Bring laptop, MIDI controller
